verses.verse: <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5782>raise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of them that <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against me, a <S%H7843>destroying<s%> <S%H7307>wind;<s%>

And will <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H2114>fanners,<s%> that shall <S%H2219>fan<s%> her, and shall <S%H1238>empty<s%> her <S%H776>land:<s%> for in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble<s%> they shall be <S%H5921>against<s%> her <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

<S%H413>Against<s%> him that <S%H1869>bends<s%> let the <S%H1869>archer<s%> <S%H1869>bend<s%> his <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> him that <S%H5927>lifts<s%> himself up in his <S%H5630>brigandine:<s%> and <S%H2550>spare<s%> you not her <S%H970>young<s%> men; <S%H2763>destroy<s%> you utterly <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H6635>host.<s%>
Thus the <S%H2491>slain<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and they that are <S%H1856>thrust<s%> <S%H1856>through<s%> in her <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has not been <S%H488>forsaken,<s%> nor <S%H3063>Judah<s%> of his <S%H430>God,<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H817>sin<s%> against the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H5127>Flee<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H4422>deliver<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5315>soul:<s%> be not <S%H1826>cut<s%> off in her <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> for <S%H1931>this<s%> is the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance;<s%> he will <S%H7999>render<s%> to her a <S%H1576>recompense.<s%>

<S%H894>Babylon<s%> has been a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that made <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7937>drunken:<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have <S%H8354>drunken<s%> of her <S%H3196>wine;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H1984>mad.<s%>

<S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> and <S%H7665>destroyed:<s%> <S%H3213>howl<s%> for her; <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6875>balm<s%> for her <S%H4341>pain,<s%> <S%H194>if<s%> so be she may be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

We would have <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> but she is not <S%H7495>healed:<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> her, and let us <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> into his own <S%H776>country:<s%> for her <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H5060>reaches<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and is <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up even to the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> our <S%H6666>righteousness:<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> and let us <S%H5608>declare<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Make <S%H1305>bright<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows;<s%> <S%H4390>gather<s%> the <S%H7982>shields:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5782>raised<s%> up the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes:<s%> for his <S%H4209>device<s%> is <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it; <S%H3588>because<s%> it is the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of his <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

<S%H5375>Set<s%> up the <S%H5251>standard<s%> on the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> make the <S%H4929>watch<s%> <S%H2388>strong,<s%> <S%H6965>set<s%> up the <S%H8104>watchmen,<s%> <S%H3559>prepare<s%> the <S%H693>ambushes:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H2161>devised<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

O you that <S%H7931>dwell<s%> on <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H214>treasures,<s%> your <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> and the <S%H520>measure<s%> of your <S%H1215>covetousness.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H5315>himself,<s%> saying, <S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H518><s%> I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> you with <S%H120>men,<s%> as with <S%H3218>caterpillars;<s%> and they shall <S%H6030>lift<s%> up a <S%H1959>shout<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you.

He has <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by his <S%H3581>power,<s%> he has <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and has <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> by his <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>

When he <S%H5414>utters<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> there is a <S%H527>multitude<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> and he causes the <S%H5387>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> he <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1300>lightning<s%> with <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H214>treasures.<s%>

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H1197>brutish<s%> by his <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6884>founder<s%> is <S%H3001>confounded<s%> by the <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image:<s%> for his <S%H5262>molten<s%> image is <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%> and there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in them.
They are <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H8595>errors:<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>

The <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is not like them; for he is the <S%H3335>former<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> things: and Israel is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

You are my <S%H4661>battle<s%> <S%H4661>ax<s%> and <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war:<s%> for with you will I <S%H5310>break<s%> in pieces the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and with you will I <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms;<s%>

And with you will I <S%H5310>break<s%> in pieces the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider;<s%> and with you will I <S%H5310>break<s%> in pieces the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider;<s%>

With you also will I <S%H5310>break<s%> in pieces <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman;<s%> and with you will I <S%H5310>break<s%> in pieces <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H5288>young;<s%> and with you will I <S%H5310>break<s%> in pieces the <S%H970>young<s%> man and the <S%H1330>maid;<s%>

I will also <S%H5310>break<s%> in pieces with you the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> and his <S%H5739>flock;<s%> and with you will I <S%H5310>break<s%> in pieces the <S%H406>farmer<s%> and his <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of oxen; and with you will I <S%H5310>break<s%> in pieces <S%H6346>captains<s%> and <S%H5461>rulers.<s%>

And I will <S%H7999>render<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7451>evil<s%> that they have <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, O <S%H4889>destroying<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and I will <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> on you, and <S%H1556>roll<s%> you down from the <S%H5553>rocks,<s%> and will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H8316>burnt<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

And they shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> of you a <S%H68>stone<s%> for a <S%H6438>corner,<s%> nor a <S%H68>stone<s%> for <S%H4146>foundations;<s%> but you shall be <S%H8077>desolate<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H5375>Set<s%> you up a <S%H5251>standard<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H6942>prepare<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her, <S%H8085>call<s%> together <S%H5921>against<s%> her the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H780>Ararat,<s%> <S%H4508>Minni,<s%> and <S%H813>Ashchenaz;<s%> <S%H6485>appoint<s%> a <S%H2951>captain<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her; cause the <S%H5483>horses<s%> to <S%H5927>come<s%> up as the <S%H5569>rough<s%> <S%H3218>caterpillars.<s%>

<S%H6942>Prepare<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her the <S%H1471>nations<s%> with the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes,<s%> the <S%H6346>captains<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5461>rulers<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion.<s%>

And the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7493>tremble<s%> and <S%H2342>sorrow:<s%> for every <S%H4284>purpose<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H6965>performed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> an <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>

The <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> have <S%H2308>declined<s%> to <S%H3898>fight,<s%> they have <S%H3427>remained<s%> in their <S%H4679>holds:<s%> their <S%H1369>might<s%> has <S%H5405>failed;<s%> they <S%H1961>became<s%> as <S%H802>women:<s%> they have <S%H3341>burned<s%> her dwelling <S%H4908>places;<s%> her <S%H1280>bars<s%> are <S%H7665>broken.<s%>

One <S%H7323>post<s%> shall <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> another, and one <S%H5046>messenger<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> another, to <S%H5046>show<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> that his <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H3920>taken<s%> at one <S%H7097>end,<s%>

And that the <S%H4569>passages<s%> are <S%H8610>stopped,<s%> and the <S%H98>reeds<s%> they have <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> are <S%H926>affrighted.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> The <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is like a threshing <S%H1637>floor,<s%> it is <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1869>thresh<s%> her: <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> while, and the <S%H6256>time<s%> of her <S%H7105>harvest<s%> shall <S%H935>come.<s%>

<S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> me, he has <S%H2000>crushed<s%> me, he has <S%H3322>made<s%> me an <S%H7385>empty<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> he has <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> me up like a <S%H8577>dragon,<s%> he has <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H3770>belly<s%> with my <S%H5730>delicates,<s%> he has <S%H1740>cast<s%> me out.

The <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to me and to my <S%H7607>flesh<s%> be on <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> shall the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H559>say;<s%> and my <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3778>Chaldea,<s%> shall <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H559>say.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7378>plead<s%> your <S%H7379>cause,<s%> and take <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> for you; and I will <S%H2717>dry<s%> up her <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and make her <S%H4726>springs<s%> <S%H3001>dry.<s%>

And <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1530>heaps,<s%> a dwelling <S%H4583>place<s%> for <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and an <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> an <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>
They shall <S%H7580>roar<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> like <S%H3715>lions:<s%> they shall <S%H5286>yell<s%> as <S%H738>lions'<s%> <S%H1484>whelps.<s%>

In their <S%H2527>heat<s%> I will <S%H7896>make<s%> their <S%H4960>feasts,<s%> and I will make them <S%H7937>drunken,<s%> that they may <S%H5937>rejoice,<s%> and <S%H3462>sleep<s%> a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> and not <S%H6974>wake,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
I will <S%H3381>bring<s%> them <S%H3381>down<s%> like <S%H3733>lambs<s%> to the <S%H2873>slaughter,<s%> like <S%H352>rams<s%> with he <S%H6260>goats.<s%>

<S%H349>How<s%> is <S%H8347>Sheshach<s%> <S%H3920>taken!<s%> and how is the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8610>surprised!<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> is <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations!<s%>
The <S%H3220>sea<s%> is <S%H5927>come<s%> up on <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> she is <S%H3680>covered<s%> with the <S%H527>multitude<s%> of the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof.

Her <S%H5892>cities<s%> are a <S%H8047>desolation,<s%> a <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and a <S%H6160>wilderness,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>dwells,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> does any <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H2004>thereby.<s%>

And I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H1078>Bel<s%> in <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and I will <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> that which he has <S%H1105>swallowed<s%> up: and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall not <S%H5102>flow<s%> together any <S%H5750>more<s%> to him: <S%H1571>yes,<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> you out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of her, and <S%H4422>deliver<s%> you every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H6435>lest<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H7401>faint,<s%> and you <S%H3372>fear<s%> for the <S%H8052>rumor<s%> that shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%> a <S%H8052>rumor<s%> shall both <S%H935>come<s%> one <S%H8141>year,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that in another <S%H8141>year<s%> shall come a <S%H8052>rumor,<s%> and <S%H2555>violence<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4910>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4910>ruler.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> that I will do <S%H6485>judgment<s%> on the <S%H6456>graven<s%> images of <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> and her <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H954>confounded,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H2491>slain<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of her.

Then the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is therein, shall <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> for the <S%H7703>spoilers<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to her from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

As <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has caused the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5307>fall,<s%> so at <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H3588>Though<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> should <S%H5927>mount<s%> up to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H3588>though<s%> she should <S%H1219>fortify<s%> the <S%H4791>height<s%> of her <S%H5797>strength,<s%> yet from me shall <S%H7703>spoilers<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to her, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
A <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H2201>cry<s%> comes from <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans:<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7703>spoiled<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H6>destroyed<s%> out of her the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6963>voice;<s%> when her <S%H1530>waves<s%> do <S%H1993>roar<s%> like <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> a <S%H7588>noise<s%> of their <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H5414>uttered:<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> on her, even on <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and her <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men are <S%H3920>taken,<s%> every one of their <S%H7198>bows<s%> is <S%H2865>broken:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H1578>recompenses<s%> shall surely <S%H7999>requite.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> The <S%H7342>broad<s%> <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall be utterly <S%H6209>broken,<s%> and her <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%> shall be <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3021>labor<s%> in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> and the <S%H3816>folk<s%> in the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and they shall be <S%H3286>weary.<s%>

Then shall you <S%H559>say,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> it off, that <S%H1115>none<s%> shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in it, <S%H1115>neither<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> nor <S%H929>beast,<s%> but that it shall be <S%H8077>desolate<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And it shall be, when you have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H7121>reading<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book,<s%> that you shall <S%H7194>bind<s%> a <S%H68>stone<s%> to it, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H6578>Euphrates:<s%>
